mapper.sql: SELECT list.organization_id, list.item_number, list.item_description, wsm.new_item_number, wsm.new_item_description, isnull(ioq.quantity, 0) AS onhand_quantity, isnull(abs(isq.wie_d), 0) AS wie_l_quantity, isnull(isq.pr_s, 0) AS pr_quantity, isnull(isq.po_s, 0) AS po_quantity, isnull(abs(isq.doo_d), 0) AS so_quantity, 0 AS parent_plan_po_quantity FROM cux_po_lead_time_list list LEFT JOIN pes_item_supply_demand_quantity isq ON ( list.organization_id = isq.organization_id AND list.inventory_item_id = isq.inventory_item_id ) LEFT JOIN sync_inv_onhand_quantity_new ioq ON ( list.organization_id = ioq.organization_id AND list.inventory_item_id = ioq.inventory_item_id ) LEFT JOIN cux_work_substituted_material wsm ON ( list.organization_id = wsm.organization_id AND list.inventory_item_id = wsm.inventory_item_id AND GETDATE() BETWEEN wsm.effective_start_date AND wsm.effective_end_date )

select.where: and list.stock_method = '战略备货' and list.organization_id = #{organizationId} and list.item_number like (#{itemNumber} + '%') and wsm.new_item_number like (#{newItemNumber} + '%')
